fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Business and Industry, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Digital economy and society, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: All activities in the areas of data protection, digitalization, marketing and ecommerce.
organisation_name: Data &Marketing Association Finland (FIDMA), Suomen Asiakkuusmarkkinointiliitto ry (ASML/FIDMA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The objective is to support and improve the operating conditions of the data driven marketing industry and the members of the association in establishing a good and trusting relationship with consumers, media, business, industry, the authorities and government institutions as well as providing self regulation, member services, research, training and events.
